document_data.name: Quarterstaff
document_data.mainbody: A '''quarterstaff''' ({{Plural|quarterstaves}}) was a simple, two-handed melee weapon.
document_data.Description: Quarterstaves were usually made of wood and sanded cylindrical with a diameter of {{SIrange|2|4|in|c}}, with blunt ends. Though they could be plain wood, some were intricately carved works of art. Some were known to enhance their quarterstaves with metal-shod ends or textured striking surfaces.
document_data.Weaponology: Quarterstaves were one of the simplest weapons available to any adventurer. Often favored among martial artists, [[monk]]s, and some [[ranger]]s. [[Wizard]]s often used enchanted quarterstaves to channel arcane energy and as walking-sticks.

Notable Users of Quarterstaves.Classes: * [[Spirit shaman]]s were known to be proficient in the use of quarterstaves.
Notable Users of Quarterstaves.Nations: * Quarterstaves were a commonly used weapon among inhabitants of [[Malatra]].{{Cite polyhedron/102/Heroes of Malatra|14}}
Notable Users of Quarterstaves.Religions: * The gods [[Azuth]] and [[Panzuriel]] were both known to consider quarterstaves their favored weapons.
